shapes.init_eqs_str: (function(){a['vol'] = 0; a['bob'] = 0; a['border_1'] = 0; a['ro'] = 0; a['sp'] = 0; a['red'] = 0; a['spi'] = 0; a['tm'] = 0; a['bob']=1.71; a['ro']=0; a['red']=Math.floor(rand(20));}())

pixel_eqs_eel:
zoom = zoom + 0.02*cos(rad*16 + ang*3 + time*-3.5)*(bass/3-rad);
rot = rot * (0.8-rad);
